structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Regulations of special licenses to be prescribed by board.
law.text: The prohibitions, restrictions and regulations relating to special licenses shall be those which the board may by its regulations and in the exercise of its sound discretion prescribe.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-191.
